name: Slack format for slash command messages
precondition:
Slack Import test files are kept in Google Drive here
You will use the above files for the tests.
It is important you have an account on the Slack team before exporting, so you can test claiming a Mattermost account imported from Slack.

inline.description:
Slack format for slash command messages
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
LM: Need to seed Slack import account with an ephemeral message that has an attachment (see https://github.com/mattermost/platform/pull/4999) ?
inline.expectedResult: • Message should be styled like a System Message, and still have attachment

customFields.Important notes about this step: This step is "N/A" on the original spreadsheet and may need to be deleted here.
